data.eml:eml: Two new species of genus Deferunda Distant (Hemiptera: Fulgoromorpha: Achilidae) from southwest China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chen, Xiang-Sheng, He, Ting-Ting (2010): Two new species of genus Deferunda Distant (Hemiptera: Fulgoromorpha: Achilidae) from southwest China. Zootaxa 2335: 59-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.193169
